import fastapi\n\
from pydantic import BaseModel\n\
import argparse\n\
from fastapi.cli import FastAPICommand\n\
\n\
app = fastapi.FastAPI()\n\
model = BaseModel(schema_extra={'example': {'name': 'John'}})\n\n\
class MyCommand(FastAPICommand):\n    model = model\n\n\
